original_title: Team HNBA shines at SLIM National Sales Awards
original_body_lines: Despite what was considered a challenging year for the entire insurance industry, team HNB Assurance yet again proved its exceptional sales skill and performance, with four members of its team securing wins at the SLIM National Sales Awards 2022. The awards ceremony, organized by the Sri Lanka Institute of Marketing (SLIM), is regarded as the most anticipated event of the year for the sales fraternity, recognizing the efforts and achievements of high-performing individuals in the sales field.

The winners from HNBA included Thilan Karunathilake, National Sales Manager 2022 Gold Award – Overall Industry Category, Ms Priyanka Kamalani, Front Liner 2022 Gold Award – Life Insurance Category, Ms. S Kamalini, Sales Supervisor 2022 Bronze Award – Life Insurance Category, Buddhika Jayawardena, Front Liner 2022 Bronze Award – Life Insurance Category.

Sharing his thoughts on these achievements, CEO of HNBA Lasitha Wimalaratne, said, “I would like to extend my warmest congratulations to Thilan, Priyanka, Kamalini, and Buddhika for their invaluable contributions in their respective fields amidst challenging market conditions and for bringing honor to HNBA. It is their commitment and unwavering passion which has helped them achieve this remarkable feat in the most prestigious Sales Awards Ceremony in the country.”

“The recognition our team from HNBA received at the SLIM National Sales Awards 2022 is a testament to the company’s commitment to nurturing and developing its teams, ensuring that they are equipped with the skills and knowledge necessary to excel in the industry.

‘I would also like to express my gratitude to SLIM for creating a platform to acknowledge the outstanding efforts of our sales personnel, which has served as a source of inspiration for them to further develop and excel in their careers.” stated Shiran Fernando, Head – Sales Training & Development.’

HNB Assurance PLC (HNBA) is one of the fastest growing Insurance Companies in Sri Lanka with a network of 64 branches. HNBA is a Life Insurance company with a rating of ‘A-‘ (lka) by Fitch Ratings Lanka for ‘National Insurer Financial Strength Rating’. Following the introduction of the segregation rules by the Insurance Regulator, HNB General Insurance Limited (HNBGI) was created and commenced its operations in January 2015; HNBGI continues to specialize in motor, non-motor and Takaful insurance solutions and is a fully owned subsidiary of HNB Assurance PLC.

HNB General Insurance has been assigned a ‘National Insurer Financial Strength Rating’ of ‘A-‘ (lka) by Fitch Ratings Lanka Limited. HNBA is rated within the Top 100 brands and Top 100 companies in Sri Lanka by LMD and HNB Assurance has won international awards for Brand Excellence, Digital Marketing and HR Excellence including the Great Place To Work® Certification, and won many awards for its Annual Reports at award ceremonies organized by the Institute of Chartered Accountants of Sri Lanka.
